title: Getting Into the Hype w/ Kurt Warner
description:
Cam Heyward recaps week 2 of Steelers training camp and discusses the hype around George Pickens and Calvin Austin. Then, Hall of Famer Kurt Warner joins Cam to break down the Steelers QB battle and give his thoughts on Kyler Murray, Baker Mayfield, video games, and more.
